summary: This code exports a functional component that takes an array of 2D arrays of "TokenAndActivation" objects and renders a heatmap for each token. The tokens are displayed within a block-style div, with each token's heatmap displayed inside its respective div.

details.comment: This code exports a functional component that takes an array of 2D arrays of "TokenAndActivation" objects and renders a heatmap for each token. The tokens are displayed within a block-style div, with each token's heatmap displayed inside its respective div.
